description: Mike’s Mobile Screen & Chimney Service is the premier screen and chimney company in Sacramento. We have been in the Sacramento area since 2002 and have offered a full range of chimney services and screen door, repair and installations to our customers! Chimney services include: chimney cleanings, inspections, repairs, rebuilds, masonry work and much more! We also offer Screen Repair and Installation, Security Doors, Awnings and much much more!

reviews.name: DeAnn P.
reviews.content: Our dryer was setting off our smoke alarm and it turns out that the vent was extremely clogged. We had a difficult clean out situation due to the age of our home and the manner in which the dryer was originally set up. Mike's Mobile fit us in within hours of our call.  Vivian who responded to our call and Brian that came out to do the work were very courteous and competent. We feel fortunate to have found them and are very happy with the results.

reviews.name: Rebecca A.
reviews.content: We had a dog door installed into our sliding screen door today. The apt was for 9:30 am and and Mike's Mobile Screen & Chimney Service arrived early.  The installers Kyle and Joseph were very patient while we tried to calm our dogs down so that they could do their job. The whole process took less than 45 minutes. We are so impressed with the work done that we will be having them return to install a 2nd dog door.

reviews.name: Cesar G.
reviews.content: Damian is an absolute asset to this team. He was thorough and spent the time to go over the report ensuring I understood the results. He was super knowledgeable and gave us some really good pointers and things to look out for. Luckily our chimney will only be needing a couple of minor repairs. We plan on completing the chimney repairs in the coming months and will definitely be reaching back out to Mike's Mobile screen and chimney.

description: At Mike's Mobile, we take pride in successfully solving your chimney needs in a cost effective and timely manner. Our goal is to make sure that your trust in us develops into a lifelong working relationship. From the office to the field, our employees have been trained by CSIA and NFI standards to give you superior customer service and high-quality workmanship. Chimney maintenance is important as chimneys vent hazardous gasses out of your home. Chimneys that are not annually swept and or inspected can potentially be a hazard to you, your family and your home. Maintaining the interior and exterior of your chimney will not only help protect you, your family and your home, but annual maintenance will aid in finding smaller problems before they develop into costly, more extensive repairs.
